targets.rawSql:
SELECT u.UserReportDate, u.NumVerifiedUsers FROM datamart.userreport u
LEFT JOIN core.dim_date d ON u.UserReportDateFK = d.date_key
LEFT JOIN core.dim_time t ON u.UserReportTimeFK = t.time_key
WHERE d.Quarter IN ($Quarter)
AND d.Weekday IN ($DayOfWeek )
AND INITCAP(d.weekend_indr) IN ($Weekday)
AND t.Hour IN ($Hour )
AND t.Daytime IN ($Daytime )

targets.rawSql:
SELECT n.NewUserReportDate::DATE as the_day, SUM(n.NumNewUsers) as NumNewUsers
FROM datamart.newuserreport n
LEFT JOIN core.dim_date d ON n.NewUserReportDateFK = d.date_key
LEFT JOIN core.dim_time t ON n.NewUserReportTimeFK = t.time_key
WHERE d.Quarter IN ($Quarter)
AND d.Weekday IN ($DayOfWeek )
AND INITCAP(d.weekend_indr) IN ($Weekday)
AND t.Hour IN ($Hour )
AND t.Daytime IN ($Daytime )
GROUP BY the_day
ORDER BY the_day

panels.title: Number of Users Joined Per Interval

targets.rawSql:
SELECT Email, FirstName, DateJoined, 
CASE WHEN UserRole = 'A' THEN 'Admin'
     WHEN UserRole = 'O' THEN 'Owner'
     WHEN UserRole = 'M' THEN 'Moderator'
     ELSE 'User' END as UserRole, Verified, Blacklist, Politeness, Honesty, Quickness, NumReviews
FROM core.kkuser
LEFT JOIN core.dim_date d ON DateJoinedFK = d.date_key
LEFT JOIN core.dim_time t ON TimeJoinedFK = t.time_key
WHERE d.Quarter IN ($Quarter)
AND d.Weekday IN ($DayOfWeek )
AND INITCAP(d.weekend_indr) IN ($Weekday)
AND t.Hour IN ($Hour )
AND t.Daytime IN ($Daytime )

SELECT Email, FirstName, DateJoined, CASE WHEN UserRole = 'A' THEN 'Admin'
     WHEN UserRole = 'O' THEN 'Owner'
     WHEN UserRole = 'M' THEN 'Moderator'
     ELSE 'User' END as UserRole, NumberOfChats, NumberOfListings, NumberOfSoldListings, NumberOfClosedListings, NumberOfBoughtListings, NumberOfReports, AvgUserRating
FROM core.kkuser
LEFT JOIN core.dim_date d ON DateJoinedFK = d.date_key
LEFT JOIN core.dim_time t ON TimeJoinedFK = t.time_key
WHERE d.Quarter IN ($Quarter)
AND d.Weekday IN ($DayOfWeek )
AND INITCAP(d.weekend_indr) IN ($Weekday)
AND t.Hour IN ($Hour )
AND t.Daytime IN ($Daytime )

AND Condition IN ($Condition)
AND d.Quarter IN ($Quarter)
AND d.Weekday IN ($DayOfWeek )

AND t.Hour IN ($Hour )
AND t.Daytime IN ($Daytime )
GROUP BY the_day
ORDER BY the_day

panels.title: Number of Sold Listings Per Day

panels.description:
How long a listing closed in that day took to close.
-1 indicates the day had no closed listings.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT NewListingReportDate::DATE as the_day, AVG(AverageCloseTime) as AverageCloseTime 
FROM datamart.newlistingreport
LEFT JOIN core.dim_date d ON NewListingReportDateFK = d.date_key
LEFT JOIN core.dim_time t ON NewListingReportTimeFK = t.time_key
WHERE Category IN ($Category )
AND Condition IN ($Condition)
AND d.Quarter IN ($Quarter)
AND d.Weekday IN ($DayOfWeek )
AND INITCAP(d.weekend_indr) IN ($Weekday)
AND t.Hour IN ($Hour )
AND t.Daytime IN ($Daytime )
AND AverageSellTime > -1
GROUP BY the_day
UNION
SELECT NewListingReportDate::DATE as the_day, AVG(AverageCloseTime) as AverageCloseTime 
FROM datamart.newlistingreport
WHERE Category IN ($Category)
AND Condition IN ($Condition)
GROUP BY the_day
HAVING AVG(AverageSellTime) = -1
ORDER BY the_day

SELECT NewListingReportDate::DATE as the_day, AVG(AverageCloseTime) as LabEquipmentCloseTime 
FROM datamart.newlistingreport
WHERE Category IN ($Category)
AND Category = 'Lab Equipment'
AND Condition IN ($Condition)
AND AverageSellTime > -1
GROUP BY the_day
UNION
SELECT NewListingReportDate::DATE as the_day, AVG(AverageCloseTime) as LabEquipmentCloseTime 
FROM datamart.newlistingreport
WHERE Category IN ($Category)
AND Category = 'Lab Equipment'
AND Condition IN ($Condition)
GROUP BY the_day
HAVING AVG(AverageSellTime) = -1
ORDER BY the_day

SELECT NewListingReportDate::DATE as the_day, AVG(AverageCloseTime) as OtherCloseTime 
FROM datamart.newlistingreport
WHERE Category IN ($Category)
AND Category = 'Other'
AND Condition IN ($Condition)
AND AverageSellTime > -1
GROUP BY the_day
UNION
SELECT NewListingReportDate::DATE as the_day, AVG(AverageCloseTime) as OtherCloseTime 
FROM datamart.newlistingreport
WHERE Category IN ($Category)
AND Category = 'Other'
AND Condition IN ($Condition)
GROUP BY the_day
HAVING AVG(AverageSellTime) = -1
ORDER BY the_day

FROM datamart.newlistingreport
WHERE Category IN ($Category)

UNION

panels.title: Average Sell Time Per Day

panels.description:
Every day since March 10th.
How much difference there is between the selling price and the asking price.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT NewListingReportDate::DATE as the_day, 
  AVG(AveragePriceSaleDifference) FILTER (
    WHERE AveragePriceSaleDifference != -999999 
    AND Category IN ($Category )
    AND Condition IN ($Condition)
    AND d.Quarter IN ($Quarter)
    AND d.Weekday IN ($DayOfWeek )
    AND INITCAP(d.weekend_indr) IN ($Weekday)
    AND t.Hour IN ($Hour )
    AND t.Daytime IN ($Daytime )) as FlatPriceDifference,
  AVG(AveragePercentSaleDifference) FILTER (
    WHERE AveragePercentSaleDifference != -1 
    AND Category IN ($Category )
    AND Condition IN ($Condition)
    AND d.Quarter IN ($Quarter)
    AND d.Weekday IN ($DayOfWeek )
    AND INITCAP(d.weekend_indr) IN ($Weekday)
    AND t.Hour IN ($Hour )
    AND t.Daytime IN ($Daytime )) as PercentPriceDifference

FROM datamart.newlistingreport
LEFT JOIN core.dim_date d ON NewListingReportDateFK = d.date_key
LEFT JOIN core.dim_time t ON NewListingReportTimeFK = t.time_key
GROUP BY the_day
ORDER BY the_day

targets.rawSql:
SELECT NewModReportDate::DATE as the_day, AVG(AverageTimeToClose) as AverageTimeToClose 
FROM datamart.newmodreport
LEFT JOIN core.dim_date d ON NewModReportDateFK = d.date_key
LEFT JOIN core.dim_time t ON NewModReportTimeFK = t.time_key
WHERE d.Quarter IN ($Quarter)
AND d.Weekday IN ($DayOfWeek )
AND INITCAP(d.weekend_indr) IN ($Weekday)
AND t.Hour IN ($Hour )
AND t.Daytime IN ($Daytime )
AND AverageTimeToClose > -1
GROUP BY the_day
UNION
SELECT NewModReportDate::DATE as the_day, AVG(AverageTimeToClose) as AverageTimeToClose 
FROM datamart.newmodreport
LEFT JOIN core.dim_date d ON NewModReportDateFK = d.date_key
LEFT JOIN core.dim_time t ON NewModReportTimeFK = t.time_key
WHERE d.Quarter IN ($Quarter)
AND d.Weekday IN ($DayOfWeek )
AND INITCAP(d.weekend_indr) IN ($Weekday)
AND t.Hour IN ($Hour )
AND t.Daytime IN ($Daytime )
GROUP BY the_day
HAVING AVG(AverageTimeToClose) = -1
ORDER BY the_day

panels.title: Average Time to Close Report Per Day

panels.description: Date and time slicing is bound to when the user sold the item, not when the listing was posted.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT  u.Email,
		u.FirstName,
		COALESCE(l.SoldListings, 0) as SoldListings,
		l.AverageTimeToSell,
		l.AverageFlatDifference,
		l.AveragePercentDifference
FROM core.kkuser u
LEFT JOIN (
	SELECT UserID, 
		COUNT(*) as SoldListings,
		AVG(TimeToClose) as AverageTimeToSell, 
		AVG(DifferenceAskingSoldPrice) as AverageFlatDifference,
		AVG(SoldPrice / AskingPrice) * 100 as AveragePercentDifference
	FROM core.listing l
	LEFT JOIN core.dim_categorytype ct ON l.CategoryTypeID = ct.CategoryTypeID
	LEFT JOIN core.dim_date d ON DateChangedFK = d.date_key
	LEFT JOIN core.dim_time t ON TimeChangedFK = t.time_key
	WHERE d.Quarter IN ($Quarter)
	AND d.Weekday IN ($DayOfWeek )
	AND INITCAP(d.weekend_indr) IN ($Weekday)
	AND t.Hour IN ($Hour )
	AND t.Daytime IN ($Daytime )
	AND ListingStatus = 'S'
	AND DifferenceAskingSoldPrice != -999999
	AND ct.Category IN ($Category )
	AND Condition IN ($Condition)
	GROUP BY UserID
) l ON l.UserID = u.UserID

panels.title: User Sold Listing Statistics

list.description: Q1 (Jan to Mar), Q2 (Apr to Jun), Q3 (Jul to Sep), Q4 (Oct to Dec)
list.label: Quarter
list.name: Quarter

list.label: Day of Week
list.name: DayOfWeek
list.query: Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday, Sunday

list.definition:
SELECT Category
FROM core.dim_categorytype
ORDER BY 
CASE WHEN CategoryTypeID = 2 THEN 1
WHEN CategoryTypeID = 3 THEN 2
WHEN CategoryTypeID = 1 THEN 3
END

WHEN CategoryTypeID = 3 THEN 2
WHEN CategoryTypeID = 1 THEN 3
END
